context: Task requests adding 'x' to the PostHog Go client README.md, but the specification is extremely vague with no clarity on what content should be added, where it should be placed, or what purpose it serves.
blockers: Critical: Task uses placeholder 'x' with no indication of actual content
Unclear: No specification of where in README the content should be added
Missing: No context on what feature, section, or information 'x' represents
Ambiguous: Cannot determine if this is a code example, documentation section, heading, link, or other content type

questions.question: What is the actual content or section that should be added as 'x'?
options: A code example or snippet demonstrating a specific feature
A link to external documentation or resources
A note about dependencies, compatibility, or requirements

questions.question: Where in the README should this content be added?
options: In the Quickstart section after the basic example (after line 113)
In a new section after Development (after line 130)
At the end before Questions (after line 205, before line 223)
As part of an existing section (please specify which section)

questions.question: What is the purpose or context for adding this content?
options: Documenting a new feature or capability of the SDK
Adding best practices or usage patterns
